description: Try our easy to follow Salmon Rissoles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Salmon Rissoles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan. Cook rissoles for 2-3 minutes each side until golden brown. Serve with green beans, mayonnaise and lemon.
